# Univariate tab

Select which datasets to be used (New Loans datasets or Repeated Loans dataset)

![](images/univariate%20tab%201.jpg)

Next users have to choose which variables to be analyze under Univariate Analysis

![](images/univariate%20tab%202.jpg)

The result bar chart will show you the distributions of the loans data as per the selected variable.
